About Me

Hi there! I am Najma Khatun, based in Germany. I am a senior backend developer with experience in frontend development. I have over 8 years of experience in the software development field, building projects for the web and IoT platforms.

I am a enthusiastic & passionate coder, a love for coding challenges. I am very keen to adapt new tools & technologies.
